main.desc:
Need more help? Check out the **[Support Server]({})**!
Enjoying the bot? Vote for us on **[top.gg]({})** and earn emeralds!
main.howto: Do `{0}help <command>` to see how to use that command!
main.nodoc: No documentation exists for that command.

econ.profile: `{0}profile [optional: user]` *shows the profile of you or the specified user*
econ.balance: `{0}balance [optional: user]` *shows the balance of you or the specified user*
econ.inventory: `{0}inventory [optional: user]` *shows the inventory of you or the specified user*
econ.give: `{0}give <user> <amount> <item>` *give another user an item or emeralds*
econ.honey: `{0}honey` *harvest honey from the bees you own*
econ.gamble: `{0}gamble <emeralds>` *gamble with the bot for a chance of winning emeralds*
econ.buy: `{0}buy [optional: amount of item] <item>` *buy an item from the Villager Shop*

mc.mcstatus: `{0}mcstatus [optional: server]` *checks the status of any type of Minecraft server*
mc.rcon: `{0}rcon <command>` *executes commands on a Minecraft server from Discord*
mc.randommc: `{0}randommc` *shows a random Minecraft server if you want a new place to explore*
mc.mcimage: `{0}mcimage` *turns whatever image you upload into Minecraft blocks / pixel art*
mc.stealskin: `{0}stealskin <username>` *fetches the skin of a Minecraft Java Edition player*
mc.buildidea: `{0}buildidea` *sends a random build idea for if you're bored and need inspiration*
mc.mccolors: `{0}mccolors` *shows the Minecraft colors and how to use them in the ingame chat*
mc.mcprofile: `{0}mcprofile <username>` *shows information on a Minecraft Java Edition player*
mc.nametoxuid: `{0}nametoxuid <username>` *turns an MC Bedrock Edition gamertag into an xuid*

util.config: `{0}config` *configure / setup the bot to your liking*
util.ping: `{0}ping` *shows the latency between Discord and Villager Bot*
util.links: `{0}links` *view useful links relating to Villager Bot*
util.vote: `{0}vote` *earn emeralds from voting for Villager Bot on certain websites*

fun.comic: `{0}comic` *sends a random comic from r/comics on reddit*
fun.say: `{0}say <text>` *makes the bot say the text you put in*
fun.enchant: `{0}enchant <text>` *turns text into the Minecraft enchantment table language*
fun.unenchant: `{0}unenchant <text>` *turns the enchantment table language back into text*
fun.sarcastic: `{0}sarcastic <text>` *turn text into the spongebob sarcastic text*
fun.bubblewrap: `{0}bubblewrap` *sends virtual bubblewrap for you to pop*
fun.coinflip: `{0}coinflip` *flips a coin and says the result in the chat*
fun.achievement: `{0}achievement <text>` *generates a Minecraft achievement from the given text*
fun.splashtext: `{0}splashtext <text>` *generates a Minecraft splash screen with the given text*

mod.warn: `{0}warn <user> <reason>` *warn a user for a specified reason*
mod.warns: `{0}warns <user>` *view the warns a user has, leave blank to see your warnings*
mod.purge: `{0}purge [optional: user] <amount>` *purge messages from the current channel*
mod.delwarns: `{0}delwarns <user>` *clears the warns that user has in this server*
mod.kick: `{0}kick <user>` *kicks the user from the current Discord server*
mod.ban: `{0}ban <user>` *bans the user from the current Discord server*
mod.pardon: `{0}pardon <user>` *unban the user from the current Discord server*

main.title: Villager Bot Settings
guild_content:
`{0}config prefix <new prefix>` - Change the command prefix in this server

`{0}config replies <on/off>` - Change if bot should respond to messages like "emeralds"

`{0}config difficulty <peaceful/easy/hard>` - Changes the difficulty of the game

`{0}config lang <language>` - Changes the language of Villager Bot

`{0}config mcserver <mcserver>` - Changes the server that is pinged if you don't specify a server in `/mcping`

`{0}config togglecmd <cmd>` - Change whether the specified command can be used or not
user_content:
`{0}config giftalert <on/off>` - Change whether bot tells you if you've been given items or emeralds

`{0}config clearrconpasswords` - Clear your saved remote console passwords from the database

main.title: Villager Bot Ajustes
guild_content:
`{0}config prefix <nuevo prefijo>` - Cambiar el prefijo del comando en este servidor

`{0}config replies <encendido/apagado>` - Cambiar si el robot debe responder a mensajes como "esmeraldas".

`{0}config difficulty <pacífico/fácil/difícil>` - Cambia la dificultad del juego

`{0}config lang <idioma>` - Cambia el lenguaje de Villager Bot

`{0}config mcserver <mcserver>` - Cambia el servidor que se hace ping si no especificas un servidor en `/mcping`

`{0}config togglecmd <comando>` - Cambiar si el comando especificado puede ser utilizado o no
user_content:
`{0}config giftalert <encendido/apagado>` - Cambia si el bot te dice si te han dado artículos o esmeraldas

`{0}config clearrconpasswords` - Borre sus contraseñas guardadas de la consola remota de la base de datos
